translated: The forward and reverse order of conditions, the two-and-two method, the text in brief

original: 18.27. Saraṇaduka, Āsavagocchakādi🔽Saraṇaṁ āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Saraṇaṁ
analyzed: saraṇadukaḥ āsava gocchaka ādi  saraṇam āsavam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ no āsavaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saraṇa
translated: The two-and-one method, the range of effluents, etc.🔽With an object that is a refuge and an effluent as condition there arises what is not a refuge but is not an effluent …

original: āsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naaraṇo noāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. Saraṇaṁ āsavaṁ🔽dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo noāsavo ca naaraṇo noāsavo ca dhammā uppajjanti hetupaccayā.🔽Hetuyā tīṇi, ārammaṇe ekaṁ …pe… avigate tīṇi.🔽Saraṇaṁ noāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca naaraṇo nanoāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: āsavam dhammam paṭicca na araṇaḥ no āsavaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saraṇam āsava  dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ noāsavaḥ ca na araṇaḥ noāsavaḥ ca dhammā uppajjanti hetu paccayā  hetuyā tīṇi ārammaṇe ekam pe avigate tīṇi  saraṇam noāsavam dhammam paṭicca na araṇaḥ na noāsavaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka
translated: With an object that is a refuge and an effluent as condition there arises what is a refuge but is not an effluent …🔽With an object that is a refuge and an effluent as condition there arises what is not a refuge and is not an effluent …🔽With an object that is not a refuge but is an effluent as condition there arises what is not a refuge but is not an effluent …

original: Araṇaṁ sāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paccayā nasaraṇo nasāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā. (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ.
analyzed: araṇam sa asavam dhammam paccayā na saraṇaḥ na sa asavaḥ dhammaḥ uppajjati hetu paccayā saṅkhitta hetuyā ekam pe avigate eka
translated: With an object that is not a refuge but is an effluent as condition there arises what is a refuge but is not an effluent …🔽With an object that is not a refuge but is an effluent as condition there arises what is a refuge and is an effluent …

original: Araṇaṁ anāsavaṁ dhammaṁ paṭicca nasaraṇo naanāsavo dhammo uppajjati hetupaccayā.
analyzed: araṇam anāsavam dhammam paṭicca na saraṇaḥ na anāsavaḥ dhammo uppajjati hetu paccayā
translated: Dependent on a safe, unadhesive Dhamma …🔽(In brief, as in Text X, §1.)

original: (Saṅkhittaṁ.) Hetuyā ekaṁ, adhipatiyā ekaṁ …pe… avigate ekaṁ. (Etena upāyena sabbattha vitthāretabbaṁ.)
analyzed: saṅkhitta hetuyā eka adhipatiyā ekam pe avigate eka etena upāyena sabbattha vitthāretabba
translated: With respect to cause, there is one; with respect to object, there is one; … with respect to non-adversion, there is one. (In this way also, in detail, it should be expanded.)
